name: Kairos (itch)
description:
In Kairos, you take control of a Greek emperor in his quest to fill his wall with achievements. But will this be enough for him?

Kairos was made in less than two weeks as a submission for the Meta Game Jam, where it finished in the 5th place.

Please, do not hesitate to comment about any bugs or feedback you would like to share.

Programmer: Daniel Fernández [Twitter] [Portfolio]
Designer: Jose Martín [Twitter]
Artist: Alejandro Moralo [Instagram]

This game is under a Creative Commons license.
